description.zh: Bazarr 是 Sonarr 和 Radarr 的配套应用，用于自动化管理和下载字幕。用户可为字幕设置语言偏好，Bazarr 将根据设定自动完成下载。该应用支持多种平台，并可与现有的媒体库无缝集成。
description.en: Bazarr is a companion application for Sonarr and Radarr that automates subtitle management and downloads. It helps users define language preferences for subtitles and handles downloading based on those settings. The app supports a wide range of platforms and integrates seamlessly with existing media libraries.

feature.zh:
## 产品优势:

- 简化由 Sonarr 和 Radarr 管理的媒体库的字幕管理流程
- 支持广泛的字幕语言和格式
- 提供受 Sonarr 启发的简洁直观用户界面

## 功能列表:

- 支持主流平台：Windows、Linux、macOS、Raspberry Pi 等
- 自动从 Sonarr 添加新剧集和新集数
- 自动从 Radarr 添加新电影
- 可基于剧集或电影配置字幕语言偏好
- 扫描现有媒体库中的内嵌和外挂字幕并下载缺失的字幕
- 记录字幕的下载来源与时间
- 支持手动搜索并按需下载字幕
- 当发现更优字幕时自动升级已下载的字幕
- 支持从磁盘中删除外挂字幕
- 当前支持 184 种字幕语言，包含强制/外文子标题（取决于提供商）
- 支持的字幕提供商包括 OpenSubtitles、Subscene、Addic7ed 等众多平台
feature.en:
## Benefits:

- Streamlines subtitle management for media libraries managed by Sonarr and Radarr
- Supports a broad range of languages and subtitle formats
- Offers a clean and intuitive UI inspired by Sonarr

## Features:

- Support for major platforms: Windows, Linux, macOS, Raspberry Pi, etc.
- Automatically add new series and episodes from Sonarr
- Automatically add new movies from Radarr
- Series or movies based configuration for subtitles languages
- Scan your existing library for internal and external subtitles and download any missing
- Keep history of what was downloaded from where and when
- Manual search so you can download subtitles on demand
- Upgrade subtitles previously downloaded when a better one is found
- Ability to delete external subtitles from disk
- Currently support 184 subtitles languages with support for forced/foreign subtitles (depending of providers)
- Supported subtitles providers include OpenSubtitles, Subscene, Addic7ed, and many more
